summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to administration of the personnel system, amending Seattle Municipal Code Title 4 to remove reporting requirements from sections 4.04.200, Employee development; 4.14.150, Moving expenses defined; 4.20.030, Salary upon appointment; and 4.20.065, Administrative reassignment; and repealing sections 4.21.080, Reporting of standby pay and 4.94.060, Reports.
